org.smooks.engine.resource.config

Class XMLConfigDigester

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.smooks.engine.resource.config.XMLConfigDigester

  • public final class XMLConfigDigester
extends Object
    Digester class for an XML ResourceConfig file (.cdrl).

    tfennelly

    • Constructor Detail

      • XMLConfigDigester

        public XMLConfigDigester(ResourceConfigSeq resourceConfigList)
        Private constructor.

        Never make this constructor (or any other) public. It's only called from 2 places:

        • From the digestConfig(java.io.InputStream, String) method.
        • From the getExtendedConfigDigester(String) method.
        The digestConfig(java.io.InputStream, String) method is public and always calls setExtensionDigestOff(). The getExtendedConfigDigester(String) method is private and always calls setExtensionDigestOn(). Playing with the public/private nature of these methods may effect the behavior of the EXTENSION_DIGEST_ON ThreadLocal.
        Parameters:
        resourceConfigList - Config list.

    • Method Detail

      • digestConfig

        public static ResourceConfigSeq digestConfig(InputStream stream,
                                             String baseURI,
                                             Map<String,Smooks> extendedConfigDigesters)
                                      throws SAXException,
                                             IOException,
                                             URISyntaxException,
                                             SmooksConfigException
        Digest the XML Smooks configuration stream.
        Parameters:
        stream - The stream.
        baseURI - The base URI to be associated with the configuration stream.
        extendedConfigDigesters - Config digesters.
        Returns:
        A ResourceConfigSeq containing the list of ResourceConfigs defined in the XML configuration.
        Throws:
        SAXException - Error parsing the XML stream.
        IOException - Error reading the XML stream.
        SmooksConfigException - Invalid configuration..
        URISyntaxException
